name: Sonic the Hedgehog in 3D
description:
Control Sonic in a Green Hill Zone themed level. Collect the Chaos Emerald from the bonus stage (although it doesn't do anything yet, haha) and Fight Dr. Eggman!

Controls:

KeyboardFunction W, A, S, DMove Sonic RRecenter the camera on Sonic SpaceJump (Hold) left shiftCrouch  (Hold) left shift + spaceCharge up spin dash. Release Shift to launch Alt + F4(Download Only) Quit

I do not claim ownership of any characters, music tracks, or sound effects. All Assets are Copyright of Sega.
